thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Anne white

author: Anne white
title: Anne white
text: Trusted house sitters is a great find for people who want their pets minded in their own home. Our dog is anxious when he goes away from home so to find a site where people will offer to look after your pets in exchange for free accommodation was perfect. They exercise and feed your animals, water plants, collect mail in exchange for a holiday in your home. Its a win, win situation!
